Class Description
Active
Represents cards having some actions.

ControllerTestKit  
Curse  
DataPackage
Client has to determine by himself if it is his turn, using DataPackage.currentPlayer and DataPackage.players Play Card: player sets DataPackage.currentCard with the HandCard played Question: list with Interactive.CardQuestion for client Answers: list with Answers to the DataPackage.questions
DataPackage.LogicAction
Actions for the Logic
DataPackage.PlayerAction
Actions for the Player
Deck<T extends Card>
Deck class representing a Deck of Cards
DeckFactory
Factory class for the Deck Creates a Deck with specified type
DeckFactory.DeckType
Decktypes

Model class representing 'event' card 'Earthquake'.

EventCard
Abstract class for EventCards EventCards are cards that get played when a black card is put on the discard pile

States for client
NetworkHandler
Helper class to support simple network communication.
NetworkHandler.NetworkConnection<T extends java.io.Serializable>
Network communication class representing a bidirectional connection between two peers (client and server), to send and receive Objects of type T.
NetworkHandler.NetworkServer<T extends java.io.Serializable>
Network communication class used on the server side to handle connection request from clients.
NumberCard  
NumeralCard
Abstract class for all Cards with a number All Numberal Cards are Handcards the number of the card is also the value of the card
PackageFactory
Factory class for game logic to create DataPackage to be sent
PlayController
Base Controller for controllers responsible during the game defines general behavior of the controllers
Player
Class representing a Player in the game Player has a name, points, a hand of cards and other internal fields.
Player

Abstract Class defining general behavior of the PreGameControllers like SingleplayerController, MultiplayerController and JoinGameController.

ServerReceiver
Server Receiver to handle different types of DataPackage
SetupController
Interface for different types of SetupControllers A setupController is a controller that only is important before the game starts.
SimpleStrategy
Class that implements the ComputerStrategy for the AI-Player This Strategy is very basic and picks a card by random

The SingleplayerController handles all functionalities for players creating a singleplayer game.
